command.text: declare @$lockedDate nvarchar(512), @$limitedDate nvarchar(512), @message nvarchar(512) select @$lockedDate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày giới hạn hoặc ngày khóa sổ.' else N'Data is locked, you must modify system locked date.' end select @$limitedDate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Trường ' + N'Ngày lập' + N' chưa nhập hoặc giá trị nhập không hợp lệ.' else N'Field ' + 'Create Date' + ' must not be blank or has invalid value.' end select ma_dvcs, 'PT0' as ma_ct, max(ngay_ct) as ngay_ct into #check from cttt50 where ngay_ct between @ngay_tu and @ngay_den and exists(select 1 from @keys where patindex('%'+ stt_rec + '%', text) > 0) group by ma_dvcs if exists(select 1 from #check where ngay_ct > @ngay_lct) begin select 'ngay_lct' as field, @$limitedDate as message return end if exists(select 1 from dmstt where ngay_ks >= @ngay_ct) begin select 'ngay_ct' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end if exists(select 1 from dmctks where user_id = @@userID and ma_ct = 'PT0' and ngay_ks >= @ngay_ct) begin select 'ngay_ct' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end if exists(select 1 from dmdvcsks a join #check b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs where ngay_ks >= @ngay_ct) begin select 'ngay_ct' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end select * into #$keys from @keys exec rs_MultiAllocation '1', @kieu_pb, @ma_nt, @ngay_ct, @ngay_lct, @ma_quyen, @size, '', @dien_giai, @message out, @@language, @@userID, @@admin if @message is not null begin select 'ma_quyen' as field, @message as message return end select '' as field, '' as message, 'refresh$Form$(this);' as script return
